2.3 Search terms
Various combinations were used which included keywords denoting the influence of maternal, preconceptual 
and gestational nutrition on metabolic programming or offspring risk of developing obesity and NCDs. The 
databases were searched using the following key words: [matern* OR pre-pregnan* OR preconception* OR 
perinatal OR pren
